item.title: CV
item.description: My international work and study experiences, charity work and hobbies:

item.title: Pay discrimination
item.description: Omega Group plc- Is there pay discrimination in the company? At the last board meeting of Omega Group Plc., the headquarters of a large multinational company, the issue was raised that women were being discriminated in the company, in the sense that the salaries were not the same for male and female executives. A quick analysis of a sample of 50 employees (of which 24 men and 26 women) revealed that the average salary for men was about 8,700 higher than for women.

item.title: Spielburg vs Burton
item.description: I would like you to explore whether the mean IMDB rating for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton are the same or not. I will run a hypothesis test and calculate the confidence intervals for the mean ratings of these two directors. Null and alternative hypothesis: H0: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is equal to zero. H1: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is not equal to zero.

item.title: US, Germany and India
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries: At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports). The GDP data we will look at is from the United Nationsâ€™ National Accounts Main Aggregates Database, which contains estimates of total GDP and its components for all countries from 1970 to today.
